request.description:
This endpoint creates a car. 

This endpoint just require a car type as strin request body. Devfined car types listed below:
    
    "cabrio", "sedan", "hatchback"

Response is also a string. That givs information about process result. For example:
 
 Success: "Cabrio Car has produced."
 Fail: "Car can not created. Car type is invalid!"
